name: THE BEST PJ SANDWICH
description:
THE BEST PJ SANDWICH!!!!!!!

In this game you will go across land fight evil bread and help jelly save peanut but it is not as easy as you think will you be able to save peanut and be a hero or suffer in defeat. Can you  save peanut before the timer runs out or will peanuts deaf be blamed on your name forever…

-By Anna.
